short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Tango: Simplify browsing. Switch tabs with a shortcut. Duplicate tabs easily for a fluid workflow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Tango is a streamlined Chrome extension crafted for the ultimate browsing efficiency. Toggle between your most recently used tabs with a simple keyboard shortcut, ensuring a smooth and intuitive navigation experience. Enhanced with a quick tab duplication feature, Tab Tango keeps your workflow fluid and dynamic. Perfect for multitaskers and power users looking to optimize their browser usage without the fuss.

Features:

    * Toggle between recently used tabs
    * Quickly duplicate the active tab
